task.title: How to start coding in Scratch
task.shortdesc: Easy steps to guide you in building your scratch project.

taskbody.context: Learn to build your first Scratch project using the code blocks.

step.cmd: Select Events to view the list of code blocks.
Drag and drop when clicked in the middle section.
Select Looks to view the list of code blocks.
Drag and drop say Hello! for 2 seconds below the previous block.
Select the Go flag on the top right section.

taskbody.result: You have created your first program.
